name: toxicity
content:

the level of poison contained in a drug, or the ability of a drug to poison the body: The patient displays signs of hypothyroidism due to drug toxicity. Tests of the chemical have shown that it has a high level of toxicity. The toxicity of the drug severely limits its use.
